Model Setup

create_sbm()

Create SBM

Network

Functions for manipulating underlying network structure of SBM model

Add node to network

add_connection()

Add connection/ edge

set_node_parent()

Set node parent

initialize_groups()

Initialize groups

get_state()

Get state

load_from_state()

Modeling

Function to fit or investigate fit of SBM model

mcmc_sweep()

MCMC Sweep

compute_entropy()

Compute Entropy

sample_posterior()

Visualization

Functions to visualize the structure of network and/or results of modeling

Visualize Network

Network Simulation

Functions to generate networks using the stochastic block model. Usefull for testing etc..

sim_basic_block_network()

Simulate basic block network

sim_sbm_network()

Simulate SBM Network

sim_simple_network()

Simulate simple network
